original: @21b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: rgya gar skad du

analyzed: sr badzra dharma sa dha nam

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du

original: dpal rdo rje chos kyi sgrub thabs /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje chos kyi sgrub thabs

original: dpal rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje chos la phyag tshal lo

original: nyes pa'i dra ba bcom pa'i dpal ldan rdo rje chos //
analyzed: nyes ba dra ba joms ba dpal ldan rdo rje chos

original: ngag gi dkyil 'khor spros pa'i 'od kyi dra ba ste /
analyzed: ngag gi dkyil khor spros ba d kyi dra ba ste

original: @22a * // yang dag sangs rgyas ma lus ngag gi rang bzhin la //
analyzed: yang dag sangs rgya ma lus ngag gi rang bzhin la

original: rab tu btud nas ngag gi sgrub thabs brjod par bya //
analyzed: rab tu dud nas ngag gi sgrub thabs rjod ba byed

original: sngags kyi rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par dag pa'i gzugs //
analyzed: sngags kyi rang bzhin gyis ni rnam ba dag ba gzugs

original: rab brjod brtson 'grus rlung dang 'dra bas bskyod pa yis //
analyzed: rab rjod brtson grus rlung dang dra ba skyod ba yis

original: sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu chu zla rtag par ni //
analyzed: sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu chu zla rtag ba ni

original: 'jig rten ma lus pa 'di rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: jig rten ma lus ba di rnam ba bsgom ba byed

original: pam gi yi ge las byung rnam par bsgom pa ni //
analyzed: pam gi yi ge las byung rnam ba bsgom ba ni

original: ma lus rnam dag ngo bo sna tshogs padma ste //
analyzed: ma lus rnam dag ngo bo sna tshogs padma ste

original: aa yig las skyes dpag tu med pa'i 'od gsal ba //
analyzed: aa yig las skye dpog tu med ba d gsal ba

original: cha ni ma lus rnam par dag pa zla ba ste //
analyzed: cha ni ma lus rnam ba dag ba zla ba ste

original: yang ni gsang ba mchog ni sna tshogs par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: yang ni gsang ba mchog ni sna tshogs ba gyur ba

original: sa bon yi ge las ni rab tu byung ba'i 'jig rten 'od kyi tshogs //
analyzed: sa bon yi ge las ni rab tu byung ba jig rten d kyi tshogs

original: bandu ka yi me tog 'od kyi rnam pa dra ba can //
analyzed: bandu ka yi me tog d kyi rnam ba dra ba can

original: gang gis spros pa rab tu byung ba'i rgyu gcig po //
analyzed: gang gis spros ba rab tu byung ba rgyu gcig po

original: de yi sa bon yang dag gyur pas skyon med son //
analyzed: de yi sa bon yang dag gyur ba skyon med son

original: ting 'dzin phyag rgya 'chang ba'i phyag na padma ste //
analyzed: ting dzin phyag rgya chang ba phyag na padma ste

original: rdo rje gdan gnas snying rje mngon par nyams dga' ba'i //
analyzed: rdo rje gdan gnas snying rje mngon ba nyams dga ba

original: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dod pas yongs su dag pa'i chags //
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje dod ba yongs su dag ba chags

original: ba spu'i khung bur byung gyur rnam dag sangs rgyas kyi //
analyzed: ba spu khung bur byung gyur rnam dag sangs rgya kyi

original: sprin gyi tshogs kyis 'gro la phan pa'i don du ni //
analyzed: sprin gyi tshogs kyis gro la phan ba don du ni

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i blo ni rab 'byed par //
analyzed: shin tu rnam ba dag ba blo ni rab byed ba

original: thams cad 'gro ba'i rang bzhin du ni rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: thams cad gro ba rang bzhin du ni rnam ba bsgom

original: snying gar zla ba'i gzugs la rdo rje rab bltas te //
analyzed: snying gar zla ba gzugs la rdo rje rab lta te

original: 'bar ba yis ni 'jig rten thams cad gsal byed pa //
analyzed: bar ba yis ni jig rten thams cad gsal byed ba

original: yig h'um mgon po las ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzugs //
analyzed: yig hum mgon po las ni yongs su rdzogs ba gzugs

original: lnga yi bdag nyid sangs rgyas sprin gyi tshogs byung ba //
analyzed: lnga yi bdag nyid sangs rgya sprin gyi tshogs byung ba

original: de yi dbus ma'i rva yi rtse mor gsal gnas la //
analyzed: de yi dbus ma rva yi rtse mor gsal gnas la

original: nges gnas lus kyis 'jig rten gsum po gsal byed pa //
analyzed: nges gnas lus kyis jig rten gsum po gsal byed ba

original: yi ge chen pos rnam 'joms mang zhing mi 'gyur ba'i //
analyzed: yi ge chen pos rnam joms mang zhing mi gyur ba

original: rgyud las sdug bsngal rab tu rgyas pa'i mun pa ste //
analyzed: brgyud las sdug sngal rab tu rgya ba mun ba ste

original: de las byung ba'i mdzes pa'i 'od kyi tshogs ldan pa'i //
analyzed: de las byung ba mdzes ba d kyi tshogs ldan ba

original: nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan dri med nyams dga' dmar po ste //
analyzed: nyi ma gzugs rnyan dri med nyams dga dmar po ste

original: shes rab sngon gyi pho nya dge ba'i ngag bskyed pa'i //
analyzed: shes rab sngon gyi pho nya dge ba ngag skyed ba

original: rdo rjer gyur pa'i lce ni rab tu rdzogs par bya //
analyzed: rdo rjer gyur ba lce ni rab tu rdzogs ba byed

original: de yi rtse mo'i cha la rol pa'i mchog gi dmar po ste //
analyzed: de yi rtse mo cha la rol ba mchog gi dmar po ste

original: de nyid rgya chen 'od ni rnam par bsam par bya //
analyzed: de nyid rgya chen d ni rnam ba bsam ba byed

original: rang gi stobs kyis rgyun du gyur pa'i brtson 'grus kyis //
analyzed: rang gi stobs kyis rgyun du gyur ba brtson grus kyis

original: rtsod pa mchog gis @22b stobs kun 'joms par byed pa ste //
analyzed: rtsod ba mchog gis stobs kun joms ba byed ba ste

original: rtag tu rab tu goms shing nges par bsgrub pa las //
analyzed: rtag tu rab tu goms shing nges ba sgrub ba las

original: ngag gi sgrub thabs dngos grub nye bar grub gyur na //
analyzed: ngag gi sgrub thabs dngos grub nye ba grub gyur na

original: tshigs bcad tshig lhug pa dag rtsol ba med par brjod //
analyzed: tshigs gcod tshig lhug ba dag rtsol ba med ba rjod

original: mtshon cha bstan bcos dag ni rnal 'byor pa yis rtogs //
analyzed: mtshon cha ston chos dag ni rnal byor ba yis rtogs

original: bstan bcos sna tshogs dag kyang nges par 'byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: ston chos sna tshogs dag kyang nges ba byed ba gyur

original: 'gro ba rnams kyi ched du bdag nyid don chen po //
analyzed: gro ba rnams kyi ched du bdag nyid don chen po

original: 'di yis gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud shes par 'gyur te //
analyzed: di yis gzhan gyi sems kyi brgyud shes ba gyur te

original: 'dod chags la sogs nyes pa'i nye ba bcom 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: dod chags la sogs nyes ba nye ba joms gyur zhing

original: gang tshe ting nge 'dzin de brtan par gyur pa'i tshe //
analyzed: gang tshe ting nge dzin de brtan ba gyur ba tshe

original: shin tu phra ba myur du gsal ba nges par rtogs //
analyzed: shin tu phra ba myur du gsal ba nges ba rtogs

original: sangs rgyas ma lus dang mnyam sku ni 'dzin pa ste //
analyzed: sangs rgya ma lus dang mnyam sku ni dzin ba ste

original: de ltar 'gyur la the tshom 'dir ni mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar gyur la the tshom dir ni mi byed

original: byung dang 'byung bar gyur pa mdun na gnas pa bzhin //
analyzed: byung dang byung ba gyur ba mdun na gnas ba bzhin

original: goms pa'i sbyor ba yis ni skyes bus rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: goms ba sbyor ba yis ni skye bud rtogs ba gyur

original: 'dod chags rigs can bud med la ni dga' ba bzhin //
analyzed: dod chags rigs can bud med la ni dga ba bzhin

original: sems ni rjes su chags par byed na rnal 'byor grol //
analyzed: sems ni rjes su chags ba byed na rnal byor grol

original: ji snyed dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag gis bsags 'di yis //
analyzed: ji snyed dge ba rtsa ba bdag gis bsags di yis

analyzed: rgyal ba mchog gi dpal ni grol ba thob ba shog dang mya ngan mi dga zug rngu rab spong te

original: ri bong 'dzin pa'i yid ni 'od dang nye ba ste //
analyzed: ri bong dzin ba yid ni d dang nye ba ste

original: ring bor mi thogs dge ba chags pa'i sems kyis ni //
analyzed: ring bor mi thogs dge ba chags ba sems kyis ni

original: bla ma mchog las rnyed pa'i gdams ngag rol pa yin //
analyzed: bla ma mchog las rnyed ba doms ngag rol ba yin

analyzed: di yis padma rigs su gro zhing rgya gyur cig dpal gyi rjes gro ting nge dzin dbang du byed ba dga

original: bdag nyid bzang po skye 'gro mthong bar rab 'gyur ba //
analyzed: bdag nyid bzang po skye gro mthong ba rab gyur ba

original: 'bar ba'i me yi phreng ba'i dbus su gnas pa'i sku //
analyzed: bar ba me yi phreng ba dbus su gnas ba sku

original: snying rje bla mar 'dzin 'gyur thod pa'i phreng ba 'dzin //
analyzed: snying rje bla mar dzin gyur thod ba phreng ba dzin

original: chu 'dzin rgyas pa'i mngon par rab tu sngo ba'i dpal //
analyzed: chu dzin rgya ba mngon ba rab tu sngo ba dpal

original: ngag gi sgrub thabs mchog gyur ba //
analyzed: ngag gi sgrub thabs mchog gyur ba

original: bde ba'i skye bo bzang pos byas //
analyzed: bde ba skye bo bzang pos byed

original: 'di yis ngag ni sgrub byed pa //
analyzed: di yis ngag ni sgrub byed ba

analyzed: ngag gi dbang phyug de gyur shog rdo rje chos kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon su dza na bha dra mdzad ba rdzogs
